com.putable.siteriter

Interface SDLParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleSDLParserImpl

    public interface SDLParser
    A SiteRiter SDL parser. Provides the ability to load(Reader) an SDL program from an arbitrary Reader, and then to makePage(String, Map) based on the loaded SDL program.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void load(java.io.Reader reader)
      Load an SDL program from a Reader.
      java.lang.String makePage(java.lang.String key, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> selectors)
      Generate a page based on a previously-loaded SDL program.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(java.io.Reader reader)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Load an SDL program from a Reader. Stores defined rules in some form allowing makePage(String, Map) to work subsequent to calling this method. This method may be called multiple times, in which case only the last SDL program loaded has any effect on the SDLParser's behavior.
        Parameters:
        reader - An arbitrary non-null Reader. Note this reader may not be buffered, and may not support Reader.mark(int).
        Throws:
        SDLParseException - if the program read is syntactically incorrect in any way. If SDLParseException is thrown, the internal state of the SDLParser, and the behavior of makePage(String, Map), is undefined, unless and until a subsequent call to load(Reader) finishes successfully.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if reader is null
        java.io.IOException

      • makePage

        java.lang.String makePage(java.lang.String key,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> selectors)
        Generate a page based on a previously-loaded SDL program.
        Parameters:
        key - A string value (typically an URL) used to determine which possible page is generated.
        selectors - A map from Strings to Integers that provides selector values for all, some, or none of the selector values referenced in the most recently load(Reader) SDL program.
        Returns:
        The entire generated page as a single String.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if load(Reader) has not yet successfully completed on this SDLParser
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either argument is null.
